Class DateHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • coms309.mainproject.schedule.helpers.DateHandler

extends java.lang.Object
    This is a helper class for date comparisons

    • Method Detail

      • checkDate

        public boolean checkDate(java.util.Calendar eventTime)
        Check if the input date is today's date
        Parameters:
        eventTime - - The Calendar instance of some event
        Returns:
        True if the class Calendar and the Event Calendar are the same day; False otherwise

      • checkDate

        public boolean checkDate(java.lang.String eventDate)
        Alternate date checking method which uses the date string instead of calendar format
        Parameters:
        eventDate - - a string version of some Event's date/time
        Returns:
        True if the class Calendar and the eventDate address the same day; False otherwise

      • checkClassTime

        public boolean checkClassTime(java.lang.String classTime,
                              java.lang.String day)
        Scan the days and times string from a course to tell if there is class today
        Parameters:
        classTime - - all times for the lectures of some Course
        day - - the weekday for comparison
        Returns:
        True if lecture is held on the day given by the parameter; False otherwise

      • checkLabTime

        public boolean checkLabTime(java.lang.String classTime,
                            java.lang.String day)
        Scan the days and times string from a course to tell if there is lab or recitation today
        Parameters:
        classTime - - all times for the labs/recitations of some some course
        day - - the weekday for comparison
        Returns:
        True if lab/recitation is held on the day given by the parameter; False otherwise

      • getDay

        public java.lang.String getDay(int num)
        Get the day of the week based on a given index.
        Parameters:
        num - - index corresponding to a day of the week
        Returns:
        A string containing a single character representing the day of the week
